nodes.text: What th-? Are you one of the new Servants?
You see Barkus, the Vault City Servant Coordinator.
You can't even promise me that he won't have a heat attack once he leaves you care. He's old. 100 or nothing.
Give me a moment to take care of the arrangements...
All right, forget " 's Syndrome." I'd still like to negotiate for Joshua's release.

I'm tired of Servants being sent over with no clearance... *sigh*... let's see, you said you were looking for the Vault? That must be your assignment for the day. Very well. I will have someone escort you there.
This is the Servant Assignment Center.
You sound a lot like that idiot Moore...just what Vault City needs. Look, whoever you are, I have work to do, so if you'll kindly remove yourself...
Excellent. Here is your money. I will have him shipped off for medical tests and processing.
What are you doing back here? I sent you to the Vault! Of all the... very well, I will have someone escort you back there.
Hmmmm. All right. $200, then. And no more haggling.
Give me a moment to take care of the arrangements...
Joshua? Yes, we do have a Servant by that name. He was recently transferred from the Corrections Center. Your interest in him is...?
I don't think it's a good idea. Wait until he has undergone some more training first, then I'll consider it.
Perhaps you should return when you have a servant of value to show me. Your current stock... is unimpressive.
Hmmm. that boy there, Davin, is it? He look relatively free from Outworlder contamination. I will buy him from you for $250.
Give me a moment to take care of the arrangements...
Hmmn. Donations are indeed welcome to insure the smooth operation of the Center, but it would require a sizeable donation before I could release Joshua into your care.
Of course, Captain. I will take care of it right now.
No, you need to be a Citizen in order to be allowed into the Vault. Now, look, I happen to be very busy at the moment, so if you would please excuse me...
No, not scripters, you moron.
Yes...I have noticed those symptoms in the Servants of late. Contagious, you say? Hmmm. Well, if this Joshua is a carrier, I shall release him at once. Give me a moment to make the arrangements...
Our Servants are usually refugees from raider attacks or contractual prisoners who wish to work off their sentence in a productive manner.
The Servant Allocation Center is closed. Please return in the morning.
Joshua? Yes, we do have a Servant by that name, but you wouldn't want him assigned to you. Training him has been...difficult. I'm not certain he can be trained.
Infected? Infected with what? 's Syndrome. A lot of Outworlders have it. Its symptoms include, uh, speaking when not being spoken to. And using coarse language.
Yes, he's more stubborn than almost any Servant we've ever had here. If I didn't know better, I'd assume his father was a brahmin.
I'd watch that kind of talk if I were you. It is NOT slavery. We take care of these refugees, and they have a good life...better than they would get in the wastes.
Perhaps. Do you have some you wish to sell?
Hmmm. That man there...Vic, is it? Even though he's old, he looks like a handyman. $100.
That's true. I have had to separate him from some of the others...and just yesterday one of the Servants actually had the audacity to question one of my requests.
The Vault? It's that huge hole in the mountain on the east side of the city. Head out the front door, turn left and walk straight ahead. You can't miss it.
Excellent. Here is your money. I will have the tribal shipped off for medical tests and processing.
Yes, what is it? I'm behind in my assignments.
Uh...
You must be new around here. I'll explain it...slowly.
What th--?! A ghoul! In Vault City! Guards! Guard!
Symptoms? What kind of symptoms?
You see...another...Vault City official.
Are you aware of 's Syndrome? It doesn't show up on most medical scans, and its symptoms can lie dormant for weeks.
Yes, Citizen?
In the wastes, there is a disease called 's Syndrome. Perhaps you've noticed the lowered energy level of your Servants recently? Their general surliness?
Look. It'll take a week to wash the smell off that tribal. 100 or nothing.
Citizens who need help with menial tasks come here to have a Servant assigned to them for the day.

Very well. Your Servant has been relocated for medical testing and re-conditioning. Curious...the Servant seemed quite surprised by the whole affair. It took a few tranquilizer darts to smooth things over. I put everything the Servant was carrying in the box in my office.
Hmmmmmmm. $200. And not a dollar more.
Excellent. Here is your money. I will have the old man shipped off for medical tests and processing.
Hmmm. That tribal you have. He smells...strongly. But he looks healthy. I'll take him for $100.

Well...that's not as much of a donation as I would like, but it will do. I shall see to it that this Joshua you have requested is shipped to the Courtyard for processing. Let me make the necessary arrangements.
Give me a moment to take care of the arrangements...
Oh, really? And what makes you think I would release him?
Hmmmm. He is a healthy specimen. $400 for him, then.
You convinced Barkus to release Joshua.
No, the boy looks like he would be difficult to train...200 or nothing.

links.text: Yup
Uh-uh me leave now
Very well. I will go pick him up there, then.
Nothing it is, then. I can't afford to let my servant go for that price. Maybe some other time.
All right, that's fair. The servant's all yours.
Sure. I'll just wait here.
I'm leaving, then. Goodbye.
Valt! Valt!
Servant Allocation, huh? Do you buy slaves...er, servants here?
I'm looking for a particular Servant...Joshua, I believe. Is he here?
No, just curious. Thanks.
Why don't you make me leave?
All right, all right...
Sure. I'll just wait here.
Oh-keeeee
Actually, I'm not looking to sell that slave. Let's deal another time.
That's fair. The servant's all yours.
Sure. I'll just wait here.
No reason. I did have some other questions...
All right. Goodbye.
No reason. I did have some other questions...
I suspect he has a contagious disease. You might want to release him before he infects the other Servants.
I suspect he has a contagious disease. You might want to release him before he infects the other Servants.
I'd like to negotiate for his release.
You said he's been difficult?
Just one more question...
All right. Goodbye.
Just one more question...
Actually, I'm not looking to sell that slave. Let's deal another time.
That is a fair price. The servant's all yours.
C'mon, the slave's worth more than that.
Actually, I'm not looking to sell that slave. Let's deal another time.

That is a fair price. The servant's all yours.
Sure. I'll just wait here.
How about $1000?
How about $500?
How about $750?
I see. I may return later.
How about $250?
Excellent. Thank you, Citizen.
Excellent. Thank you, Citizen.
Excellent. Thank you, Citizen.
Just one more question...
All right. Goodbye.
Just one more question...
Moron? I had to work hard to get the minimum 9 Intelligence and Perception to find this node.  Anyway, you were saying?
Hmmm. I had another question...
At the cost of their freedom, eh?
Oh, you mean scripters? I knew this guy named Dan once who...
Are you looking to buy any slave...er, servants...right now?
Hmmm. I had another question...
Do you have a contractual prisoner named Joshua in custody?
I see. Thanks for the information.
I need to question him about a matter of Vault City security. Have him sent to the Courtyard  at once.
All right. Goodbye.
Oh, I don't want him assigned to me. Far from it. I am concerned that he might be infected.
Oh, I don't want him assigned to me. Far from it. I am concerned that he might be infected.
I would like him assigned to me anyway.
Oh, I don't want him assigned to me. Far from it. I am concerned that he might be infected.
Difficult?
Hmmm. Another question then...
Hmmm. Another question then...
I could purchase him and take him off your hands. Does the Center take..."donations?"
Just one more question...
Just one more question...
You know, that kind of attitude could prove to be a problem. What if the rest of the Servants start following his example?
All right. Goodbye.
Where do you get them?
Oh, I had some other questions...
That's all I needed to know then, thanks. Good day.
Oh, I had some other questions...
No, not today, actually. Goodbye.
Yes, I have one right here with me. Take a look and make me an offer.
Yes, I have one right here with me. Take a look and make me an offer.
Yes, I have one right here with me. Take a look and make me an offer.
No, actually. I had some questions for you...
Yes, I have one right here with me. Take a look and make me an offer.
No, actually. I had some questions for you...
Actually, I'm not looking to sell that slave. Let's deal another time.
C'mon, the slave's worth more than that.
That is a fair price. The servant's all yours.
You should release him now before it gets worse.
Can anyone get in there?
What is this building?
I had another question for you.
I had another question for you.
Thanks for the directions. Goodbye.
Sure. I'll just wait here.
You looking to buy any slaves...er, servants?
I'm looking for a particular Servant...Joshua, I believe. Is he here?
Umm...Me luuwk Valt!
Shamble off
I'm looking for the Vault.
I am looking for a particular Servant...Joshua, I believe. Is he here?
All right, just curious, thanks. Good day.
Are you looking to buy slaves...er, servants, right now?
That sounds a lot like slavery.
Where do you get all these servants?
Umm...hurnhh?
Very well. I will go pick him up there, then.
Maybe I was wrong. Nevertheless, I'd like to negotiate for his release.

I'm looking for the Vault.

Really? Well, I 'm sure they'll be more docile as time goes on. Are you interested in any other companions?
Really? Well, I 'm sure they'll be more docile as time goes on. Are you interested in any other companions?

Okay.

I suspect he has a contagious disease. You might want to release him before he infects the other Servants.
